attributes.action: Stop Obama from coming to UK to make a speech about styaing in the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
Visit violates 

Article 1.2 of the UN Charter - Equal Rights and Self-Determination of peoples, http://www.un.org/en/sc/repertoire/principles.shtml#rel1

https://www.chathamhouse.org/sites/files/chathamhouse/public/Research/International%20Law/il280207.pdf

http://www1.umn.edu/humanrts/instree/principles1970.html

http://www.theguardian.com/politics/2016/feb/12/barack-obama-plans-eu-referendum-intervention 

Obama's speech is in violation of international law and should not occur.
attributes.background: On June 23 the UK will vote about EU membership. Several media sources are stating President Obama is planning to give a speech supporting the UK remaining in the EU. It is not accepted practice foreign leaders interfer with internal matter and Obama should not speak on this matter.
